author: perrozzi
body:
not having received any specific comment I tried to implement it in the most "general"way.
In my local tests it worked for aMG_aMC@NLO in LO and NLO mode, POWHEG with and without JHU and MiNLO.
Surely can be improved code-wise, let me know if you have comments (like what is the best way to pass to "find" an array of strings and get the OR of the match, more than duplicating the lines)
title: fix LHERunInfoProduct duplication
